name: silvie-bot
description: A Discord bot for the Grand Archive TCG.
author: James Donnelly <2203377+JamesDonnelly@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.build-local: yarn clean & yarn tsc --outDir ./dist & yarn build-api-data & shx cp ./src/deck-builder/types.ts ./dist/deck-builder/types.ts
scripts.parse: yarn update-static-files & yarn update-stocklist-files & yarn update-misc-files & yarn build-local
scripts.generate-blog-templates: echo "Blog templates will be built in blog.silvie.org." & node ./dist/blog/generate-blog-templates.js --trace-warnings & node ./dist/blog/lowest-pop-cards.js --trace-warnings & node ./dist/blog/named-cards.js --trace-warnings & node ./dist/blog/cards-by-illustrator.js --trace-warnings & node ./dist/blog/cards-by-misc.js --trace-warnings
scripts.generate-tracker-data: echo "Tracker data will be built in silvie-monorepo." & node ./dist/collection-tracker/generate-tracker-data.js --trace-warnings
scripts.update-static-files: yarn generate-deck-builder-data & yarn generate-tracker-data & yarn generate-blog-templates
